allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Medical Student Grader web app

Next.js 14 application for generating narrative evaluations for medical
students completing clinical clerkship rotations. Uses GPT-5.2 to generate
professional strengths-only narratives based on selected criteria.

Features:
- Clerkship-specific evaluation templates \(Surgery, Internal Medicine, etc.\)
- Fail/Pass/Honors criteria selection
- Personal attributes tagging
- AI-powered narrative generation with natural language output
- Copy-to-clipboard for MedHub submission

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
